strategy_reasoning: Using a retro RPG 'inventory update' and 'patch notes' theme fits the pixel art aesthetic perfectly while gamifying the technical updates. A carousel allows us to break down the dense features (new models, audio, fixes) into digestible, cozy visual bites.

images.prompt: [Pixel art bee character opening a glowing magical chest in a garden]. Cozy 8-bit pixel art aesthetic. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel peach gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, sparkling particles. Warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Pixel text: 'WEEKLY LOOT'. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.
images.description: Cover image showing the bee mascot discovering new treasures (the updates).

images.prompt: [Retro RPG inventory screen showing three new shiny items: a paintbrush, a camera, and a film reel]. Cozy 8-bit pixel art aesthetic. Soft lime green (#ecf874) UI borders and cream background. Chunky icons representing Imagen-4, Flux-2, and Grok-Video. Warm lighting. Pixel text: 'NEW MODELS'. Nostalgic but beautiful.
images.description: Visualizing the new models as game items to be equipped.

images.prompt: [Pixel art bee wearing tiny headphones speaking into a retro microphone]. Cozy 8-bit pixel art aesthetic. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and lavender gradient background. Visible pixel sound waves in pastel colors. Warm lighting, lo-fi vibes. Pixel text: 'TTS ADDED'. Nostalgic but beautiful.
images.description: Announcing the ElevenLabs TTS endpoint with a cute audio-themed visual.

images.prompt: [Pixel art stream flowing smoothly without rocks blocking it]. Cozy 8-bit pixel art aesthetic. Soft lime green (#ecf874) grassy banks. A tiny signpost says 'FIXED'. Warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like A Short Hike. Serene and calm atmosphere representing the bug fixes. Nostalgic but beautiful.
images.description: Representing the timeout fixes and scroll issues as a smooth, unblocked path.

caption:

alt_text: A carousel of cozy 8-bit pixel art images featuring a cute bee mascot, retro game inventory screens in lime green and pastel colors, and serene garden scenes announcing new AI models and bug fixes.
